column2: an A.M. Eatery////Once we were seated the experience was OK. Food service was slow
column3: but it wasn't the waitress' fault. Just a busy restaurant with a busy kitchen. Their menu has a wide variety of options. Pancakes were some of the best I've ever had
column4: as well as the bacon. They specialize in making the classic unique. Plenty of specialty drinks to choose from their brunch menu and they have fancy coffee drinks.
